mapper.insert: insert into t_field_types(id, field_t01, field_t02, field_t03, field_t04, field_t05, field_t06, field_t07, field_t08, field_t09) values ( #{id}, #{fieldT01}, #{fieldT02}, #{fieldT03}, #{fieldT04}, #{fieldT05}, #{fieldT06}, #{fieldT07}, #{fieldT08}, #{fieldT09} )
mapper.update: update t_field_types set field_t01 = #{fieldT01}, field_t02 = #{fieldT02}, field_t03 = #{fieldT03}, field_t04 = #{fieldT04}, field_t05 = #{fieldT05}, field_t06 = #{fieldT06}, field_t07 = #{fieldT07}, field_t08 = #{fieldT08}, field_t09 = #{fieldT09}, version = version + 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id as Id, field_t01 as FieldT01, field_t02 as FieldT02, field_t03 as FieldT03, field_t04 as FieldT04, field_t05 as FieldT05, field_t06 as FieldT06, field_t07 as FieldT07, field_t08 as FieldT08, field_t09 as FieldT09, version as Version from t_field_types where id = #{id}
select version from t_field_types where id = #{id}

select id as Id, field_t01 as FieldT01, field_t02 as FieldT02, field_t03 as FieldT03, field_t04 as FieldT04, field_t05 as FieldT05, field_t06 as FieldT06, field_t07 as FieldT07, field_t08 as FieldT08, field_t09 as FieldT09, version as Version from t_field_types
